user.title: Tasmanian Fuel Prices: Authentication
user.description:
This integration requires a free API Key and Secret from the NSW API portal. Please sign up at:
https://api.nsw.gov.au/Product/Index/22

Once you have your keys, enter them below.

init_options.title: Tasmanian Fuel Prices: General Options
init_options.description: Select one or more preferred fuel types to monitor. You can also add 'Favourite' stations using their station codes to create dedicated sensors for them. Finally, enable any discount programs you use.

woolworths_discount.title: Configure Woolworths Discount
woolworths_discount.description:
Enter your Woolworths discount amount as a whole number (e.g., 4 for 4 cents). You can also add station codes for participating locations not in the default list.

To contribute to the main list, please visit:
https://github.com/ziogref/TAS-Fuel-HA-Additional-Data

coles_discount.title: Configure Coles Discount
coles_discount.description:
Enter your Coles discount amount as a whole number (e.g., 4 for 4 cents). You can also add station codes for participating locations not in the default list.

To contribute to the main list, please visit:
https://github.com/ziogref/TAS-Fuel-HA-Additional-Data

ract_discount.title: Configure RACT Discount
ract_discount.description:
Enter your RACT discount amount as a whole number (e.g., 6 for 6 cents). You can also add station codes for participating locations not in the default list.

To contribute to the main list, please visit:
https://github.com/ziogref/TAS-Fuel-HA-Additional-Data

tyre_inflation.title: Optional: Tyre Inflation Adjustments
tyre_inflation.description:
This page is optional. If you don't know what to do, leave the fields blank and click submit.

You can use this to correct the community-sourced list of stations with tyre inflation. For example, add a station that has a new machine, or remove a station where the machine is broken.

To contribute to the main list, please visit:
https://github.com/ziogref/TAS-Fuel-HA-Additional-Data

error.auth_error: Invalid authentication credentials. Please check your API Key and Secret and try again.
error.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

init.title: Tasmanian Fuel Prices: General Options
init.description: Re-configure your preferred fuel types, favourite stations, and select which discount programs you want to enable.
